title: We're number ONE!
body: As of right now, our website is the #1 search result on google for the word "moxie." That's pretty impressive considering there are over 3.3 million other results for the same word, and yet there we are... king of the google mountain. Our little website even trumps wikipedia's entry for Moxie soda! Who knows how long we'll stay on top, but being the internet nerd I am, I'm awfully proud. This must be what it feels like to be a parent and watch your kid do something really, really awesome... like that time I fell out of a treehouse while my mom was watching. Awesome. UPDATE: We just dropped back to #3. I guess I better cancel this weekend's congratulatory cocaine-fueled parties. Fame is a fickle mistress, indeed. UPDATE: Now we're at #2! Obviously Google is trying to play with my mind. It may have worked once, Larry, but never again! Do you hear me?! NEVER AGAIN!
author: Dan

comments.author: nate
comments.body:
Dan, long time reader, eight thousand four hundred and forty first time poster.

What are some of the other, more interesting, searches that have directed googlers to this website?  Love the site - I'll take your answer off the air thanx

comments.author: drm00se
comments.body:
You guys are both creepy.

But that's sweet about the google search thing.

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body: It's not on the first page for me.

comments.author: drm00se
comments.body:
I'm so proud that I got to see it while it was #1.

It's still #3 for me.

But whatevz.

comments.author: evilvet
comments.body: Your Google ranking may be ephemeral, but the M-O-X-I-E theme song shall remain indelibly tattooed in my brain like some bizarre OK tattoo, and will continue to rear its ugly ditty self into my conscious brain at least a half dozen times per day for eternity.  Thanks and congratulations for that, Moxie.

comments.author: drm00se
comments.body:
Yeah, way to go JR!

Is he on the forums?

comments.author: drm00se
comments.body: Does he not love us anymore?

comments.author: El Brian de Moore
comments.body:
Posted By: nateDan, long time reader, eight thousand four hundred and forty first time poster. What are some of the other, more interesting, searches that have directed googlers to this website? Love the site - I'll take your answer off the air thanx
plus many points ... good stuff congratz moxie website!

comments.author: nate
comments.body: Also, that count was accurate up to and including that post!  I'm awesome yay!
